alert.note: Alert for Benton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marshall and southern Benton Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holly Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Holly Springs, Lamar, Snow Lake Shores, Hickory Flat, Ashland, Potts Camp, Winborn, Spring Hill, Hudsonville, Higdon, Lake Center, Pine Grove, Cornersville, Bethel and Waites. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
